      • PokerPlayer

        public PokerPlayer(java.lang.String playerName,
                   boolean isComputer,
                   int skillLevel)
        Default Player constructor
        Parameters:
        playerName - Name of the player
        isComputer - True if this is a computer player, false if this is a human player
        skillLevel - Skill level (1 - 10) for computer players, not required for human players
